runs.comm: good length and angled in from over the wicket, MS taps it to the covers
pitched up and swings away outside off, beating the groping bat
Tiripano brings this one back in, blocked back to the bowler
back of a length and outside off, MS nudges in front of the covers, takes on Raza's arm, and gets off the mark
full and angled in on middle, neatly clipped to the left of midwicket
banged in short and outside off, Ghani loads up for a pull and only drags it down towards mid-on off the toe end of the bat
MS backs away outside leg, Chisoro is wary of it as he fires outside off. Left alone
skids on middle and leg, bunted defensively in front of midwicket

and MS tees off! He sees the flight, likes it, and launches it straight down the ground, after stepping away and manufacturing swinging room. He celebrates 1000 T20I runs, the first player from an Associate nation to achieve the feat!
dug in short on middle, rocked back and away. Pulled over midwicket, there is protection in the deep
another skiddy ball on off, played back to the bowler
width outside off, slashed to cover
dug in short, MS unleashes another pull, he gets in square enough, beating deep midwicket to his right. He slides in vain at the edge of the boundary
Tiripano keeps it short, MS pulls it behind square. Short fine leg dives to his left and half-stops it
full and aimed at off, MS is deep in the crease as he whips it to midwicket
full and holds its line on off, big agricultural swipe to deep midwicket
low full toss on off, pushed to midwicket off the inside half
112.2ks slower ball, which tricks Ghani. He races down the track, swings and misses. The keeper is beaten as well
slides on, flat on off, punched to mid-off
shortish on middle, MS slinks away outside leg and carves it up and over the cover-point region
another flat darter outside off, MS makes room again. This time, he miscues it back to the bowler
another short ball as MS creates swinging room, slapped into cover
nudged off the pads to short midwicket
fired into the pads at 97.2ks, pull and a miss as Chisoro pings the pad
starts off with a canny slower ball outside off. MS is early into his leg-side slog and is beaten
follows it up with another slower ball, nurdled in front of square for one
an appeal for caught behind, not given. Banged in short, Ghani is late onto the hook. He is socked on the helmet, the ball balloons into the gloves of the keeper
dug in short again, attacks the body. He is struck on the shoulder now, missing the hook
the short ball does not work against MS. Banged in short on middle, MS moves away outside leg and slashes over backward point, finding the third-man boundary
width outside off, MS reaches out and lashes a cut, straight to backward point
full and straight, the batsman whirls his wrists and flicks behind square
back of a length and around off, guided to point for one
whoa! Slower full ball on middle, MS shuffles across off now. He topples over, but manages to ramp it over short fine leg
too straight in line, whipped into the gap at midwicket
full and on off, solid push to mid-off for one. Strike rotate - check. Ghani needs to do more of this

just clears mid-off! Full and on off, MS jumps outside leg again. He does not middle the lofted drive. Scoops it in the air... Chigumbura at mid-off throws himself up but the ball swirls away from him

first-ball wicket for Cremer! Pushed through, skids off the surface, beats Ghani's cut and thuds into the top of off. It is a legal ball and Ghani is gone for 5 off 13 balls. Ghani did not think Cremer had him. He perhaps thought that the keeper had knocked the bails off
legbreak outside off, keeps low. He flashes and misses
turns away outside off on a length, dragged towards mid-off off the inside half
tossed up, straighter, MS pushes forward and gets an inside edge to leg
down the pitch and nudged to the leg side off another inside edge
full and on middle, Shazad clears his front leg and mows it over cow corner

dug in on middle as MS makes room. Slogged into the air, Raza runs across to his right from wide long-on, dives, but can't hang onto the catch. He parries it over to the boundary. Perhaps, he was put off by the deep midwicket fielder
six, four, four! short ball, MS makes room and smites it over cow corner. What a way to bring up a fifty, he pulls off a star man pose, a la Afridi
yorker, whipped to midwicket
back of a length, off the thigh and behind square on off
full ball, which is whipped past midwicket
MS steps out, does not meet the pitch. Pops off the pad to the keeper. The caught behind appeal is nipped in the bud
punched from outside off to midwicket
clean strike! Flighted on off, Stanikzai dances out and lifts it over long-on. Cleared the fielder with ease
loopier on off, squirted behind square via an inside edge
tickled off the pads to short fine leg

flighted length ball outside off, MS runs down the track and sends it clattering over cow corner again. That is his zone. Hu-geee, mighty blow! He does even watch the ball ping the roof. Just holds his pose and then punches gloves with his partner #what a boss
picked away off the pads behind square
angled onto the hips from round the wicket, knocked through midwicket
down the pitch and lofted to long-on

full toss outside off, above the waistline, well above the waistline, sliced to short third man, who dives to his right to snap up the catch. Called a no-ball, and the crowd likes it. They want more of MS
darted quick, may have been a seam-up ball. MS swivels and thumps a pull over backward square leg
MS runs down the pitch, picks it up and deposits it over long-on for six more
worked off the pads behind square for one as MS ushers drinks
sliding across off from round the wicket, off-side wide
Bam! Slid on a fourth-stump line, MS drops to one knee and marmalises it over deep midwicket. Slog-swept with tremendous power
flat legbreak outside off, another slog-swept hit. Crunched over midwicket; one-bounce four
another darter outside off, swipe and a miss. The keeper is beaten as well
length ball on off, punched back to the bowler. Dot
dropped short on middle, Stanikzai duly skips back and pulls it between deep midwicket and deep square leg
top-quality wristwork! Takes another short ball outside off, pulls it, bisecting deep midwicket and wide long-on
sprayed miles wide outside off, MS chases it. That is perhaps directed at vacant slip. Not given a wide. MS isn't pleased
dragged from outside off to long on as MS topples over
back of a length and angled in, the batsman skips out, off the thigh and runs to fine leg

Jongwe breaks the racy stand! Back of a length and angled in on middle, Stanikzai swings wildly and does not connect. The middle stump is knocked back. Oh wait, Stanikzai may have got an inside edge onto that
and the new man ventures down the track and whacks it over midwicket. Afghanistan aren't holding back
MS jumps down the track, Jongwe sends down a lifter, soars over to the keeper. Wide called
slower-ball bouncer down leg, helped fine on the leg side, past the keeper
low full toss outside off. Poor, poor ball. Swiped over the man at deep midwicket for a flat six!
wide yorker, dug back to the bowler
oh my, oh my! Length ball outside off, MS jumps across off and launches it over the boundary rider at long-on
back of a length, slower ball, whipped off the back foot through midwicket. Just one
back of a length and outside off, Sadiq sends it over the keeper off a top edge
back of a length and outside off, jabbing punch to the deep cover boundary. Raza, I think, runs across and slides to his left in vain
fractionally short on middle, dabbed through midwicket. He moves onto 99. MS hares across for the second

there it is! MS becomes only the second Associate batsman after Berrington to make a T20I century! He leaps, hugs his partner and does the sajda. The crowd laps him up. Short ball on off, guided towards point
flighted and full outside off, Sadiq swings and carves it to sweeper cover
Chisoro held this short ball back outside off, pull and a miss, as the ball dips under the bat
skiddy ball onto the pads, deflected in front of square
slides on outside off, bottom-edged cut that beats the keeper
good length ball outside off, pasted over midwicket. Shafiqullah unleashes a slog sweep of his own. That's dropped in the crowd
slogged from outside off to deep midwicket

Mutumbami drops MS. Slower full ball outside off, MS targets the leg side and skews it off a top edge. Mutumbami goes for the catch with those big gloves and lets it slip through. That should have been taken
Shafiqullah holes out now. Short ball on the stumps, he pulls. Hit high on the bat; deep square leg swallows it
back of a length and outside off, MS looks to late cut it fine past the keeper. No dice...
full and slid outside off, shoots low to beat MS again
length and outside off, pushed to cover for a quick one. Tight, tight one
width outside off, MS moves away, creates more width and muscles it over extra-cover
short ball on middle, slugged over midwicket
down the track and drilled to long-on
MS makes room and tricks the bowler into bowling a leg-side wide
fired on middle, slog-swept to deep midwicket
Nabi backs away outside leg, the bowler chases him. Nabi misses the shot, the keeper is beaten. The result is four byes. Was there a scintilla of a tickle on it?
nice and full, slower ball outside off. MS winds up and belatedly leaves
MS shuffles across off, gets a full toss and scoops it to midwicket
banged in short and outside off, pulled into the night sky. The leap from Moor at deep midwicket isn't enough

back of a length and on off, slogged in the air towards long-on. Cremer misjudges it there and lets it burst through his hands, he can't secure it on the rebound either. He was on the move as he attempted the catch. Zim have been shot to pieces
full toss outside off, lifted to cow corner
MS is on the floor, but still finds the boundary! He shuffles away outside the off stump, the bowler follows him with a dipping full toss, which is lap scooped fine on the leg side
slower ball on off, dragged behind square on the leg side off the inside half
slower short ball outside off, flayed to cover, where Chigumbura fumbles
another slower ball, swatted to deep midwicket
Nabi comes down the pitch, he faces a slower-ball bouncer and is hit on the body. He is hoodwinked by the change of pace
Nabi slithers outside leg, the bowler follows him with a yorker. He can't connect
short ball on middle, backs away and carves it up in the air between the two fielders behind square on the off side
full and wide outside off, squeezed out to deep point
MS steps away miles wide outside off, the bowler follows him. He leaves it in the end. This one is called a wide
another one drifting too wide outside off
back of a length and wide outside off again. Bowling coach Hondo watches his team wilt under the heat
pitched up and outside off, following MS. This is not called a wide
MS flits around the crease, pushed outside off. No connection, they get a bye
pitched up and outside off, laced over sweeper cover
Tiripani unfurls the slower ball from the back of the hand. Nabi swings across the line and misses. The middle stump is pegged back. Afghanistan have raced past 200, though
banged in short, hit high on the ball. Pulled to long-on
dug in short and outside off, Naib now sizes this slower ball up and mows it over deep midwicket
dug in on the shorter side again, skewed pull to long-off
full and outside off, squeezed to third man off a thick outside edge
full and outside off, flayed into the covers. MS surpasses Levi, Gayle
Naib gets across the off stump, the bowler follows him. Lifted over backward square leg. Not middled
short ball, pulled to the deep square-leg fielder. He collects the ball and fires an accurate throw, catches Naib short on the second
